channel.title: Give staff command help
channel.description:
how do i make it so that i can do things like ::givemod etc. to players and such
plz answer plz
p.s. this is a 562 server

item.title: Give staff command help
item.dc:creator: @gnomez gnomez
item.description:
@gnomez wrote:

open commandpackethandler.java and search for any command that you have master is probably one of them
and add this under it

} if(cmd[0].equals("givemod") && (player.getUsername().equals("USERNAME"))) { Player other = World.getInstance().getPlayerList().get(World.getInstance().getIdFromName(command.substring((command.indexOf(" ") + 1)))); other.getActionSender().sendMessage("You have been promoted to Moderator."); if (other != null) { other.rights = 1; }

of course change the “USERNAME” to your user name and if you want to make more then moderator

  				other.rights = 1;

change that 1 to 2 or whatever you wish

Read full topic
